caption: It’s a part of a movie. The theme of the movie is spy and agent. Two men walk into a plane, but it seems that their relationship is not good. They are preparing something on the plane. They look at something on their computer, it’s a photo of a man. But they then have an argument. After that, one man opens the door of the plane and jumps out of it. Another man is cross, and he jump after him. The first man hit something in the sky, and he loses his consciousness. The second man saves his life, and then they land on the roof of a hall.
